query.name: net.cdolinc.staffChanges.staff.changes
query.sql: SELECT U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.id, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.yearid, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid, CASE WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid = 0 THEN 'Diocesan Office' ELSE SCHOOLS.NAME END as schoolName, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.name_change, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.title, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.first_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.middle_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.last_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.legal_first_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.legal_middle_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.legal_last_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.preferred_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.maiden_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.gender, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.dob, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.religion, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.religiousclergylay, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.personal_email, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.staff_type, CASE WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.staff_type = 0 THEN 'Not Assigned' WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.staff_type = 1 THEN 'Teacher' WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.staff_type = 2 THEN 'Staff' WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.staff_type = 3 THEN 'Lunch Staff' WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.staff_type = 4 THEN 'Substitute' Else '' END as staff_type_desc, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.position, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.fte, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.replacing, users_replaced.first_name || ' ' || Users_replaced.last_name as replacedstaff, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.replacing_other, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.old_name_placeholder, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.start_date, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.early_setup, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.deadline, CASE WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.deadline is NULL THEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.start_date ELSE U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.deadline END as completion_date, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous_employer, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous_employer_other, CASE WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous_employer = 'Other' THEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous_employer_other ELSE previous_school.name END as previous_school_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.submission_date, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.submission_time, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.who_submitted, users_submitted.first_name || ' ' || users_submitted.last_name as submittedstaff, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.final_completion_date, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.ps_created, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.ad_created, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.ad_ignored, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.lms_created, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.o365_created, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.o365_ignored, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.notes, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.suggestions, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.exit_date_radio, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.exit_radio, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.position_radio, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.leaving_radio, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous_position, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.new_position, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.change_type, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.users_dcid, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.prev_school_number, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.prev_school_name, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.calendar_year FROM U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHOOLS ON U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid = SCHOOLS.school_number LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHOOLS previous_school ON to_char(U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.previous_employer) = to_char(previous_school.school_number) LEFT OUTER JOIN schoolstaff schoolstaff_replaced ON to_char(schoolstaff_replaced.ID) = to_char(U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.replacing) LEFT OUTER JOIN users users_replaced ON to_char(users_replaced.DCID) = to_char(schoolstaff_replaced.users_DCID) LEFT OUTER JOIN users users_submitted ON U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.who_submitted = users_submitted.DCID WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND (U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0) AND (:changeType = 'allStaff' OR U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.change_type = :changeType) ORDER BY U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.submission_date DESC, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.last_name

query.name: net.cdolinc.staffChanges.duplicate.search
query.sql: SELECT u_cdol_staff_changes.id, u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type, u_cdol_staff_changes.title, u_cdol_staff_changes.first_name, u_cdol_staff_changes.last_name, users_submitted.first_name || ' ' || users_submitted.last_name AS submittedstaff, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.submission_date, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.submission_time, CASE WHEN U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid = 0 THEN 'Diocesan Office' ELSE SCHOOLS.NAME END AS schoolName FROM U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHOOLS ON U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid = SCHOOLS.school_number LEFT OUTER JOIN users users_submitted ON U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.who_submitted = users_submitted.DCID WHERE (UTL_MATCH.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(UPPER(u_cdol_staff_changes.first_name), UPPER(:firstName)) >= 75) AND (UTL_MATCH.JARO_WINKLER_SIMILARITY(UPPER(u_cdol_staff_changes.last_name), UPPER(:lastName)) >= 90) AND (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year = :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND (U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0) AND (:changeType = 'allStaff' OR U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.change_type = :changeType) ORDER BY U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.submission_date DESC, U_CDOL_STAFF_CHANGES.last_name

query.name: net.cdolinc.staffChanges.staff.existingstaff
query.description: Gets existing staff by teachers DCID
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT teachers.title, teachers.first_name, teachers.middle_name, teachers.last_name, teachers.homeschoolid FROM teachers WHERE teachers.users_dcid = :userDcid

query.name: net.cdolinc.staffChanges.staff.counts
query.description: Counts of all the staff name changes
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) total_submissions, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) total_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) AS total_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ps_created = 1 ) total_ps_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ps_created = 1 ) AS total_ps_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_created = 1 ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_ignored = 1 ) total_ad_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) - ( ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_created = 1 ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_ignored = 1 ) ) AS total_ad_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_created = 1 ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_ignored = 1 ) total_o365_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) - ( ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_created = 1 ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_ignored = 1 ) ) AS total_o365_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.lms_created = 1 ) total_lms_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) ) - ( ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.lms_created = 1 ) ) AS total_lms_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) total_new_submissions, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) total_new_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) AS total_new_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ps_created = 1 ) AS total_new_ps_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ps_created = 1 ) AS total_new_ps_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) AS total_new_ad_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) - ( ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) ) AS total_new_ad_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) AS total_new_o365_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) - ( ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) ) AS total_new_o365_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' AND u_cdol_staff_changes.lms_created = 1 ) AS total_new_lms_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'newStaff' AND u_cdol_staff_changes.lms_created = 1 ) AS total_new_lms_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) total_transferring_submissions, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) total_transferring_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.final_completion_date) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) AS total_transferring_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ps_created = 1 ) AS total_transfer_ps_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) - ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ps_created = 1 ) AS total_transfer_ps_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) AS total_transfer_ad_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) - ( ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE u_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.ad_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) ) AS total_transfer_ad_remaining, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_created = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) + ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.o365_ignored = 1 AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) AS total_transfer_o365_complete, ( SELECT COUNT(u_cdol_staff_changes.id) FROM u_cdol_staff_changes WHERE (U_cdol_staff_changes.calendar_year= :calendarYear OR :calendarYear = 0) AND ( u_cdol_staff_changes.schoolid = :curSchoolID OR :curSchoolID = 0 ) AND u_cdol_staff_changes.change_type = 'transferringStaff' ) -
